languages.text: {n}С первым же словом хаос утихает, беспорядочные действия структурируются в непонятной логике. Служители начинают двигаться синхронно, бинарная какофония превращается в симфонию отчетов, которой магос управляет словно дирижер.{/n}

{n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С первым же словом хаос утихает, беспорядочные действия структурируются в непонятной логике. Служители начинают двигаться синхронно, бинарная какофония превращается в симфонию отчетов, которой магос управляет словно дирижер.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos is coordinating like a skilful conductor.{/n}

{n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos is coordinating like a skilful conductor.{/n}

{n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

{n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

{n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Chaos endet augenblicklich und die Aktionen der Crew folgen einer nicht wahrnehmbaren Logik. Die Diener des Omnissiah arbeiten mit einem Mal synchron und das binhärische Gezeter mündet in eine Sinfonie von Berichten, die der Magos koordiniert wie ein geschickter Dirigent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Chaos endet augenblicklich und die Aktionen der Crew folgen einer nicht wahrnehmbaren Logik. Die Diener des Omnissiah arbeiten mit einem Mal synchron und das binhärische Gezeter mündet in eine Sinfonie von Berichten, die der Magos koordiniert wie ein geschickter Dirigent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le chaos cesse immédiatement et les actions de l'équipage adoptent une indiscernable logique. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie se mettent à travailler de manière synchronisée, et la clameur binhaire devient une symphonie de rapports, que le magos coordonne comme un habile chef d'orchestre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le chaos cesse immédiatement et les actions de l'équipage adoptent une indiscernable logique. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie se mettent à travailler de manière synchronisée, et la clameur binhaire devient une symphonie de rapports, que le magos coordonne comme un habile chef d'orchestre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}混乱立刻平息下来，船员们的行动仿佛得到了某种无法辨认的逻辑影响。欧姆尼塞亚所有的仆人都开始同步工作，二进制语的喧嚣声变成了数据报告的交响乐，帕斯卡像熟练的指挥一样协调着一切。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}混乱立刻平息下来，船员们的行动仿佛得到了某种无法辨认的逻辑影响。欧姆尼塞亚所有的仆人都开始同步工作，二进制语的喧嚣声变成了数据报告的交响乐，帕斯卡像熟练的指挥一样协调着一切。{/n}

languages.text: {n}騒ぎは直ちに鎮まり、クルーの行動がそうとは見てわかりづらいものの、論理的なものになる。万機神のしもべは同時に動き出し、二進数の喧騒は報告のハーモニーとなった。それをマゴスが熟練の指揮者のようにうまくまとめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}騒ぎは直ちに鎮まり、クルーの行動がそうとは見てわかりづらいものの、理論的なものになった。万機神のしもべは同時に動き出し、二進数の喧騒は報告のハーモニーとなった。それをマゴスが熟練の指揮者のようにうまくまとめる。{/n}
{n}騒ぎは直ちに鎮まり、クルーの行動がそうとは見てわかりづらいものの、論理的なものになる。万機神のしもべは同時に動き出し、二進数の喧騒は報告のハーモニーとなった。それをマゴスが熟練の指揮者のようにうまくまとめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El tumulto cesa de inmediato y la tripulación comienza a realizar acciones de una lógica indiscernible. Los servidores del Omnissiah comienzan a moverse en sincronía, y el clamor binario se convierte en una sinfonía de informes que el magos coordina como un hábil director de orquesta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El tumulto cesa de inmediato y la tripulación comienza a realizar acciones de una lógica indiscernible. Los servidores del Omnissiah comienzan a moverse en sincronía, y el clamor binario se convierte en una sinfonía de informes que el magos coordina como un hábil director de orquesta.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kargaşa anında diniyor ve mürettebat belli bir mantık çerçevesinde hareket etmeye başlıyor. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları ahenkle çalışmaya başlıyor ve ikilidil yaygara, raporlardan oluşan bir senfoniye dönüşüyor, Magos ise bu senfoniyi becerikli bir orkestra şefi edasıyla yönetiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mayhem immediately subsides, and the crew's actions fall into some indiscernible logic. The Omnissiah's servants start working in sync, and the binharic clamour becomes a symphony of reports, which the Magos coordinates like a skilful conductor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kargaşa anında azalıyor ve mürettebat belli bir mantık çerçevesinde hareket etmeye başlıyor. Hermesih'in hizmetkârları senkronize bir şekilde faaliyet gösteriyor ve ikilidil yaygara, raporlardan oluşan bir senfoniye dönüşüyor, Magos ise bu senfoniyi becerikli bir orkestra şefi edasıyla yönetiyor.{/n}
